DOC.brief_summary: The pilot study intend show efficacy intravesical electrical stimulation treat overactive bladder without frequency and/or urgency urinary incontinence .
DOC.detailed_description: The EMED Technologies detrusetTM intravesical electrical stimulation ( IVES ) catheter indicate use EMED detrusanTM 500 electrical generator treatment overactive bladder urge urinary incontinence ( UI ) woman satisfied tolerate conservative treatment . EMED interested conduct prospective randomize multi-center study IVES therapy v conventional UI treatment . In order gain sufficient knowledge treatment effect variability IVES therapy power RCT , pilot study initially conduct . The pilot study intend show efficacy IVES treat overactive bladder without frequency and/or urgency urinary incontinence safety profile IVES bad standard urological catheter . A primary endpoint 3 month show reduction incontinence event via 7-level patient global impression improvement establish . Secondary endpoint include PCI subset symptom , 3 day void diary , patient satisfaction questionnaire . Follow end therapy 3 month first therapy session conduct . 6-month , 9-month , 12-month follow conduct establish durability IVES therapy find effective 3 month first treatment
DOC.criteria: Female 1890 year old Urinary urge incontinence OR overactive bladder Prior trial medical treatment UUI OAB pelvic organ prolapse great stage 1 multiple sclerosis parkinson 's disease spinal cord injury longterm DM type I prior surgery may affect innervation detrusor nerve spinal cord pregnancy pacemaker/defibrillator PVR > 150ml dementia Stress urinary incontinence intravesical botox injection within 1 year , PTNS within 6 month , medical treatment OAB within 3 week ; bulk agent injection within 6 month
